item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer working in Automated Test Equipment (ATE) industry based in Geneva. I’m a generalist with experience in embedded software development, computer vision, ROS, mobile applications, APIs, backend services and websites. I also have a background in electronics. I mainly use C, C++ and C# and have huge interest over Crystal and Rust. Beside programming: I am attracted to vintage stuff. I practice Kendo.
